Episodes.Title: I.
Episodes.Plot: Whilst facing threats on all sides, including a possible mutiny, Captain Flint hires a young sailor named John Silver, who hides his most precious possession. As the Royal Navy gets ever more powerful, Eleanor keeps order on New Providence.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual violence, offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: II.
Episodes.Plot: Flint discovers a thief amongst his crew. Eleanor must make a difficult decision. John hides with Max, inside a brothel.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual violence, offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: III.
Episodes.Plot: While Flint and Gates realise they need help to find the Urca d'Lima, John and Billy have to increase the crew's morale. Vane impresses Eleanor and Gates receives a promotion.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual violence, offensive language and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Jeremy Crutchley, Patrick Lyster, Lawrence Joffe, Jannes Eiselen, Mark Elderkin, Neels Clasen, Quentin Krog

Episodes.Title: IV.
Episodes.Plot: Captain Flint is warned about Billy. Vane encounters someone from his past. Eleanor asks her father for help. The crew of The Walrus suffer a disastrous undertaking.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual violence, offensive language and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Jeremy Crutchley, Lawrence Joffe, Langley Kirkwood, Neels Clasen, Patrick Lyster, Mark Elderkin, Tony Caprari

Episodes.Title: V.
Episodes.Plot: Bonny confesses. Rackham makes a life-altering decision. Richard forces Eleanor's hand. A chess match is organized for Flint and the Walrus crew.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence, offensive language and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Langley Kirkwood, Lawrence Joffe, Jannes Eiselen, Patrick Lyster, Karl Thaning

Episodes.Title: VI.
Episodes.Plot: Chasing the Andromache is a pricey endeavor. Eleanor needs help from Silver. Billy believes Gates should confront Flint. Bonny takes a stand.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence, offensive language and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Langley Kirkwood, Lawrence Joffe, Andre Jacobs, Patrick Lyster, Mark Elderkin, Karl Thaning, Neels Clasen

Episodes.Title: VII.
Episodes.Plot: Flint comes clean with Gates. Randall's actions cause problems for Silver. Eleanor suffers a loss. Max helps Rackham. Vane faces his biggest challenge.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence, offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: VIII.
Episodes.Plot: The hunt for the Urca begins. Things change for Eleanor. Bonny and Rackham are haunted by their past sins.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence, offensive language and sex scenes
